alert.note: Alert for Essex; Orleans (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 6:03PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Orleans and northern Essex Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 603 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over North Troy Village, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newport City, Derby Center, Canaan, Jay, Newport Town, Jay In Franklin County, Derby Line Village, Westfield, Morgan, Warren Gore, Newport Center, North Troy Village, Averys Gore, Holland, Derby, Norton, Coventry, Troy, Averill and Warners Grant. This includes Interstate 91 between mile markers 168 and 177. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
